item.title: PHIBRO ANIMAL HEALTH CORP 10-K
item.description: PHIBRO ANIMAL HEALTH CORP, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 24, 2022 had 40764 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: products - 474 instances may - 382 instances financial - 313 instances animal - 302 instances health - 287 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
